page.title: 19A Middle School Morning
page.content: At 8.50a.m. the bell goes and everybody hurries along the various paths to their form rooms for registration. Then we go to our first lesson, today it is a library lesson. The library is on the first floor and overlooks the school driveway. It is an N shape and has books on five of the six walls. There is a wide variety of books. We have about 15 minutes to choose a book and then we go and get it stamped. Each of us has 2 tickets to get the books out on. Each lesson is 35 minutes long. Our next lesson is Maths, in which we are split up into groups by our ability. After Maths we have a 15 minute break, then we're off to our next lesson, double Games. In the summer we play rounders, short tennis,cricket(for boys) or athletics; in winter girls play netball and hockey,while boys do football & rugby.
